did.unittitle: Tom Porro collection of printed materials related to infrared spectroscopy

bioghist.p: Tom Porro worked at Perkin-Elmer Corporation for 34 years in various marketing jobs. He retired in 1992.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of printed literature largely relating to infrared spectroscopy collected by Porro. Materials include: instrumentation manuals, product specification memos and brochures, training manuals, and price lists from Perkin-Elmer; numerous reprints on fluorescence spectrophtometry, IR-FT spectroscopy, and other related topics; and a manual from the 1988 National Science Foundation Summer Institute on Microscale Organic Laboratory Techniques.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
